# What is the Data Science Initative (DSI) at Chico State? 

The DSI is an interdisciplinary community that provides support and training for Data Science to the Chico State Campus and community. 

* Read more about our [mission](mission.html).
* Who are the [people](people.html) involved? 
* Read our [report](DSInterestSurveyAnalysis.pdf) on a Survey of Data Science Interest at Chico State. 
* Data Science related [courses](Curriculum/courses.html) at Chico State.  
* Additional [Resources](resources.html) to learn R.

#### 4/7/2017 - Preparing Data for Analysis

* **Presenter:** Dr. Rick Hubbard
* **Location:** MLIB 442
* **Level:** No Experience needed. 
* **Description:** Got data need analysis? 80% of data analysis is cleaning the data, 
you can cut that time down by setting yourself up for success! Come learn how to reduce 
headaches by recording data in a manner that will allow for a smooth import into your 
analysis program of choice.
